{{about||Disney Channel in other countries|Disney Channel (international)|original Disney Channel in the United States|Disney Channel}} {{Cleanup|date=April 2008}} {{Infobox TV channel | name = Disney Channel Middle East | logofile = Disney Channel wordmark.svg | logosize = 200px | launch = April 2, 1997 | picture format = [[480i]] ([[SDTV]])
[[720p]] ([[HDTV]]) | owner = [[The Walt Disney Company]] | country = [[United Arab Emirates]] | language = [[Arabic language|Arabic]], [[English language|English]], [[Swedish language|Swedish]] | broadcast area = [[Middle East]], [[North Africa]], [[Pakistan]] and [[Maldives]]. | sister names = | web = [http://www.disneyme.com/ www.disneyme.com] | sat serv 1 = [[Orbit Showtime]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 140 | cable serv 1=[[Southern Networks|SUN]] (Pakistan)| | cable chan 1= Channel 21| | adsl serv 1=[[PTCL Smart TV]] (Pakistan)| | adsl chan 1= Channel 45| }} '''Disney Channel Middle East''' ({{lang-ar|ÙÙØ§Ø© Ø¯ÙØ²ÙÙ}}) is an edition of the [[The Walt Disney Company]]-owned [[Disney Channel]] broadcasting to the [[Middle East]], [[North Africa]] as well as [[Pakistan]] and [[Maldives]] with exceptions of [[Iraq]], [[Libya]], and [[Syria]].http://www.disneyme.com/DisneyChannel/tncs.html It is advertising-free and funded by subscription fees. ==History== Disney Channel Middle East was launched on April 15, 1997 and was back then exclusively available on the [[Orbit Network]]. In Fall 2001, it became available on [[Showtime Arabia]]. Disney Channel Middle East was only available in the [[English language|English]] when launched. On April 1, 1998, the [[Orbit Network]] launched the [[Arabic language|Arabic]] service on Disney Channel. Then, on April 16, 2007, the [[Orbit Network]] launched the [[Swedish language|Swedish]] service on Disney Channel. Now, Disney Channel is an encrypted channel available on [[Orbit Showtime]] in [[English language|English]], [[Arabic language|Arabic]], and [[Swedish language|Swedish]]. Disney channel Middle East aired all Disney Channel shows but most of them are out of the air. ==Programming== Most of the non-live-action content is dubbed into Arabic and Swedish with separate audio streams being available. In addition, Arabic subtitles are carried for [[Live action|live-action]] programs like ''[[Phil of the Future]]'', ''[[Hannah Montana]]''... ===Current Programming=== for '''kids and teen''' : *[[Hannah Montana]] *[[the suite life of zack and cody]] *[[Jonas L.A.]] *[[Phineas & Ferb]] *[[Sonny With a Chance]] *[[The Suite Life on Deck]] *[[Wizards of Waverly Place]] *[[Good Luck Charlie]] *[[Hannah Montana Forever]] *[[Fish Hooks]] *[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]] *[[So Random]] '''for children''' : *[[Handy Manny]] *[[Imagination Movers]] *[[Jungle Junction]] *[[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]] *[[Special Agent Oso]] *[[Stitch!]] *[[Replacements]] *[[Fairly Odd Parents]] ===Upcoming Series=== * ''[[A.N.T. Farm]]''http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/DNR/2010/doc/dc_af_111110.doc * ''Madison High''http://www.deadline.com/2010/11/disney-channel-preps-first-musical-series/#more-83717 * ''Austin and Ally''http://disneyinfonet.com/2010/12/08/disney-channel-orders-pilot-for-new-show/ * ''Lights, Camera, Muppets!'' {{citation needed|date=December 2010}} * ''Gravity Falls''http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/DNR/2010/doc/dc_new_120810.doc ===Popularity=== Disney Channel made a huge success in the Middle East , especially in Lebanon , where more than 90% of kids and more than 40% from teenagers watch Disney Channel . ===2011=== before June 2011 , the series [[Hannah Montana]] ended (still airing ), [[Wizards of Waverly Place]] started to air his fourth season , [[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]] premiered , [[Jonas L.A]] ended , Lemonade Mouth premiered , the second season of [[Suite Life on Deck]] ended and Season 3 started , also the first season of [[Good Luck Charlie]] ended and season 2 aired saturday 10 september , on the same day of premiering [[Sharpay's Fabulous Adventure]] , as part of the Fabulous Week . Also The Suite Life Movie premiere in 2011 . on 15 october 2011 , so random premiered . ==Programming blocks== ===Disney Junior Morning block=== {{main|Playhouse Disney Morning}} Disney Junior Morning block broadcasts from 5:35 a.m. till 8:35 a.m. [[GMT]] (8:35 a.m. till 11:35 a.m. [[KSA]]). ===Film Time! block=== Film Time! block airs Disney Animation Movies, Disney Channel Original Movies, Film Time! block broadcasts every Friday at 4:10 p.m [[GMT]] (7:10 p.m. [[KSA]]), and Saturday and Sunday at 5:50 a.m, 4:10 p.m [[GMT]] (8:50 a.m, 7:10 p.m. [[KSA]]). ====Current airing films==== *[[Camp Rock]] *[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]] *[[Cars]] *[[The Wild]] *[[Twitches (film)|Twitches]] *[[Twitches Too]] *[[Cadet Kelly]] *[[High School Musical]] *[[High School Musical 2]] *[[High School Musical 3: Senior Year]] *[[Wendy Wu: Homecoming Warrior]] *[[Halloweentown (film)|Halloweentown]] *[[Halloweentown II: Kalabar's Revenge]] *[[The Cheetah Girls (film)|The Cheetah Girls]] *[[The Cheetah Girls 2]] *[[The Cheetah Girls: One World]] *[[Minutemen]] *[[Toy Story]] *[[Toy Story 2]] *[[Meet The Robinsons]] *[[Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure]] *[[Hatching Pete]] *[[Princess Protection Program]] *[[Dadnapped]] *[[Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie]] *[[Starstruck (2010 film)|Starstruck]] *[[Read it and Weep]] *[[Johnny Tsunami]] *[[Johnny Kapahala: Back on Board]] *Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue *[[Den Brother]] *[[Harriet the Spy: Blog Wars]] *[[16 Wishes]] *[[Avalon High]] *[[Lemonade Mouth]] *[[My Babysitter's a Vampire]] *[[Sharpay's Fabulous Adventure]] ===Upcoming Movies=== *[[The Suite Life Movie]] ==Special events== ===Disney Channel Games=== [[Disney Channel Games]] Debuting in 2006, the Disney Channel Games includes stars from Disney Channel Original Series and Movies, and were telecast from the Wide World of Sports Complex at Walt Disney World in Orlando, Florida. After the kick-off Games in 2006, the 2007 and 2008 Games included Disney Channel stars from across the world, making room for the addition of a Yellow Team (Added to Blue, Red and Green) during the 2007 event. In 2008, the games featured four teams: the Cyclones, the Comets, the Lightning and the Inferno. 2008 was the last DC Games to date; the Disney Channel Games were not held in 2009 nor in 2010. The Disney channel games 2007 was aired in the Fall of 2007. And the 2008 games were aired on August 19, 2008. ===Happy Easter block=== In April 2009, Disney Channel ME showed movies every day during [[Easter]], including the premiere of ''[[Sleeping Beauty (1959 film)|Sleeping Beauty]]''; added ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'' season 2 episodes to the Saturday morning lineup; and changed its look, temporarily, to a [[spring (season)|spring]] and Easter theme. ===Demi & Selena Block=== One day before the premiere of the movie [[Princess Protection Program]] the Demi & Selena block aired from 1 p.m. [[GMT]] (4 p.m. [[KSA]]) until 6 p.m. [[GMT]] (9 p.m. [[KSA]]). In this block all programming at that time that aired included [[Demi Lovato]] and [[Selena Gomez]]. Two [[Hannah Montana]] episodes aired that had Selena as a guest-star, A [[Suite Life of Zack and Cody]] episode that Selena guest starred in, [[As the Bell Rings (United States)]] episodes that Demi starred in, [[Camp Rock]] that Demi also starred in, the premiere of the second show of [[Studio DC: Almost Live]] that both Demi and Selena starred in, and a couple of [[Wizards of Waverly Place]] episodes that Selena starred in. The channel also changed its look temporarily to match the theme colors of the movie. ===Wiz-tober Block=== Disney Channel ME, and throughout October, 2009, premiered ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie]]'', showed new episodes of [[Wizards of Waverly Place]], and showed special airings of ''[[Twitches (film)|Twitches]]'' & ''[[Twitches Too]]''. On October 31, 2009, Disney Channel ME aired [[Halloween]] episodes of all shows. The channel also changed its look, temporarily, to a [[Magical]] logo. ===Wizards Vs. Vampires Block=== Starting October 26 , 2009 till October 29 , 2009 Disney Channel ME Will air the four episodes of Wizards Vs. Vampires, in ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]''. ===Joyful December Block=== Disney Channel ME, and throughout December 2009, premiered [[Wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana]] and ''[[A Modern Twain Story: The Prince and the Pauper]]'', and run "back-to-back" episodes of selected shows. Also, Disney Channel ME traditionally aired [[Mickey's Twice upon a Christmas]] and ''[[The Muppet Christmas Carol]]'' on [[Christmas Eve]] and [[Christmas Day]]. The channel aired "Christmas specials and episodes" of its shows. The channel also changed its look, temporarily, to a [[Christmas]], [[Winter]] and [[North Pole]] look. ===Camp Rock block=== On 18 October 2010, Disney ME premiered ''[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]]'', and premiered the new shows: ''[[JONAS L.A.]]'', two new episodes, and ''[[Hannah Montana Forever]]'' (Hannah Montana's final season, season4), 2 new episodes. And Disney Channel ME aired a new episode of ''[[Sonny with a chance]]''. ===October-Takeover block=== Disney Channel ME, on Halloween 2010, aired a special Halloween episode of the Disney channel original series ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'',and a new ''[[Hannah Montana Forever]]'' and ''[[JONAS L.A.]]'' episodes. And Disney Channel ME aired the Original Movie ''Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue''. The Sunday, the channel aired the original movie ''[[Halloweentown]]'' at 19:10. ===Brothers-And-Sisters-Block=== On November 27, 2010, Disney Channel Middle East aired a special block filled with special episodes from the Disney channel original series''[[Wizards of Waverly place]]'',''[[Hannah Montana]]'',''[[Jonas]]'', ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'', ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'', ''[[Phineas and Ferb]]'' and others. It was also the premiere of Disney Channel Original Movie ''[[Den Brother]]'' at 8:50. ===Camp rock week-end Block=== On December 11, 2010, Disney Channel Middle East aired brand new episodes of ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'' and others shows. It aired also the Disney Channel original movie ''[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]]'' but, with the unseen scenes. ===Christmas Block=== On Christmas 2010, Disney Channel ME aired the premiere of the Disney channel original movie ''[[Harriet the Spy: Blog Wars]]'' starring ''[[Wizards of Waverly place]] actor ''[[Jennifer Stone]] as [[Harper Finkle]] and ''[[16 Wishes]] starring [[Debby Ryan]].Disney Channel Me will also air the premiere of [[Phineas and Ferb|Phineas and Ferb: Christmas Vacation]] ,and will premiere the first episode of [[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake it Up]] an upcoming dance show starring [[Bella Thorne]] and [[Zendaya]].Disney channel ME premiered the episode So Random holiday special from [[Sonny with a Chance]]. ===Shake it Up and Fish Hooks Weekend=== On February 27 2011, Disney Channel ME aired many new episodes of both shows. ===Candace Day=== On March 5, 2011, Disney Channel ME aired episodes of [[Phineas and Ferb]] that focus on Candace. ===Fashion Week=== From March 7 to March 13, 2011, Disney Channel Middle East premieres the most fashionable episodes of Disney channel shows. ===Hannah-Oke=== Whole of August,2011 Disney Channel airs all Hannah Montana Episodes And Music Videos With Lyrics of the Song Down... And While Disney Airing The Music Videos And The Episodes Disney Me uses its Logo(Disney Channel US' smartphone app logo) But A colored Vesion Of It. ===Disney Stars Got Talent=== 20,21 of August Disney ME Will Air Episodes From Shows With Talented Moments,And May Be Airing Disney Channel Friends For Change Games,And Will Air New Episodes Of Shake It Up. ==Disney Channel Events== Disney Channel ME also broadcasts some Disney Channel events. The main event that was broadcasted is the [[Disney Channel Games]]. *[[Disney Channel Games#Disney Channel Games 2007|Disney Channel Games 2007]], aired Fall of 2007 *[[Disney Channel Games#Disney Channel Games 2008|Disney Channel Games 2008]], aired on August 19, 2008 ==Disney Channel Concerts== *[[High School Musical: The Concert]], aired in 2007. *[[Hannah Montana: Live in London]], aired July 19, 2008. *[[The Cheetah Girls (band)|The Cheetah Girls: In Concert]], aired July 21, 2008. *[[Hannah Montana & Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert]], aired on September 12, 2008. *Jonas Brothers: Live in London, aired 27 September 2008. *The Cheetah Girls: Live In Madrid, aired 23 January 2009. ==Availability== Disney Channel Middle East is available on [[Orbit Showtime]] and on Q-tel [[Qatar]] service Mozaic TV+ . ==Logos== Disney Channel Middle East uses the [[Disney Channel (UK & Ireland)|Disney Channel UK]]'s 1997 logo starting from 1997. In December 1999, Disney Channel Middle East's identity split into two: *English versions of Disney Channel Middle East received Disney Channel UK's new logo and identity package of 1999 (created by GÃDÃON). *Arab-language versions of Disney Channel Middle East received a modified version of Disney Channel UK's logo to feature the Arabic name of channel, but it has different idents (created by Razorfish). In June 2003, Disney Channel Middle East adopted Disney Channel US' 2003 logo. In May 1, 2011, Disney Channel Middle East used Disney Channel US' smartphone app logo. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.disneyme.com/disney-tv/ Official Site] *[http://www.disneyinternational.com/disneychannel-net/ Disney Channel International Sites] {{ArabicChildTV}} {{Disney Channel}} [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[Category:Commercial-free television networks]] [[Category:Children's television networks]] [[Category:Television stations in the United Arab Emirates]] [[ar:ÙÙØ§Ø© Ø¯ÙØ²ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ´Ø±Ù Ø§ÙØ£ÙØ³Ø·]] [[es:Disney Channel Oriente Medio]] [[fr:Disney Channel Middle East]]
